proposal1.heroHeadline: Shida is losing 120 hours yearly on proposals. Here's the breakdown.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Manual proposal creation takes hours per client. Our system does it in 47 seconds, tailored to graphic design.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Here are the ongoing losses Shida faces with its current proposal process.

problems.title: Time-Consuming Process
problems.description: Every hour spent writing proposals is an hour not spent on design projects. With just four staff, this time loss is critical.

problems.title: Lost Revenue Opportunities
problems.description: Slow proposals mean delayed responses to prospects. Competitors can swoop in, costing Shida potential contracts worth thousands.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Manually created proposals risk inconsistent branding. Each misstep undermines Shida's professional image, affecting client trust and retention.

problems.title: High Human Error Risk
problems.description: Manual data entry leads to errors. Every mistake can cost Shida a client, translating to significant revenue loss annually.

problems.title: Stress on Small Team
problems.description: Proposal creation adds stress to Shida's small team. This stress reduces creativity and focus, impacting overall project quality.

problems.title: Inefficient Resource Use
problems.description: Spending valuable time on proposals instead of design work means less productivity. This inefficiency bleeds potential earnings.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces the costly, time-draining proposal process described above.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft. Our system generates them in 47 seconds, freeing up valuable time.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual proposals risk brand inconsistency. Our system ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with Shida's brand identity.

solutions.title: Error Reduction
solutions.description: Human errors are common in manual processes. Our AI eliminates errors, ensuring accuracy in every proposal.

solutions.title: Stress-Free Process
solutions.description: Creating proposals manually stresses Shida's team. Our system automates the process, reducing stress and improving focus.

solutions.title: Enhanced Client Engagement
solutions.description: Currently, slow proposals can lead to lost clients. With our system, Shida responds instantly, improving client engagement.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Shida's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Shida around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Shida.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Elevate Acme Corp's Brand Through Strategic Graphic Design.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We propose a comprehensive design overhaul to boost engagement and drive conversions, leading to measurable business growth.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently losing revenue due to underperforming design elements.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rate
problems.description: Acme Corp's current website design leads to a 20% lower conversion rate compared to industry benchmarks. This results in significant missed revenue opportunities.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistencies
problems.description: Inconsistent branding across platforms causes a 15% drop in customer trust. This directly affects repeat business and customer loyalty.

problems.title: Outdated Visuals
problems.description: Using outdated visuals leads to a 10% increase in bounce rates. Potential customers leave before engaging, resulting in lost sales.

problems.title: Poor User Experience
problems.description: A cumbersome user interface causes a 25% increase in cart abandonment, losing valuable sales.

problems.title: Ineffective Marketing Materials
problems.description: Current marketing materials fail to capture attention, causing a 30% drop in lead generation effectiveness.

problems.title: Lack of Engagement
problems.description: Social media posts receive 40% less engagement than competitors, leading to reduced brand awareness and customer interaction.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our tailored solutions directly address these critical issues Acme Corp is facing.

solutions.title: Comprehensive Brand Design
solutions.description: We will revitalize Acme Corp's brand, ensuring consistency across all platforms to build trust and loyalty.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: A modern, user-friendly website will improve conversion rates and reduce bounce rates by enhancing the user experience.

solutions.title: Marketing Collateral Development
solutions.description: Creating compelling marketing materials will capture potential customers' attention, boosting lead generation.

solutions.title: Social Media Strategy
solutions.description: An engaging social media strategy will increase brand awareness and customer interaction by optimizing content.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Shida offers unmatched expertise in transforming brands through strategic design.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Track Record
whyUsCards.description: Our clients see significant improvements in brand perception and revenue growth.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We tailor our services to meet the unique needs of each client, ensuring personalized solutions.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Design
whyUsCards.description: Our team stays ahead of design trends to offer the most innovative solutions.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Partnership
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with clients to ensure alignment with their vision and goals.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the team dedicated to transforming Acme Corp's brand.

team.name: Kenji Doshida
team.bio: Kenji leads strategy and client relationships, ensuring each project aligns with client goals and delivers impactful results.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Strategy
process.description: We conduct a thorough analysis of Acme Corp's current position and define a strategic design plan.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: Our team creates initial design concepts and begins development.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: We implement the new designs across platforms, ensuring seamless integration.

process.title: Review & Optimize
process.description: Post-launch, we review performance metrics and optimize for further improvement.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose from our investment options designed to maximize your brand's potential.

pricing.name: Basic Package
pricing.description: For companies looking to update their basic design elements.

pricing.name: Growth Package
pricing.description: Recommended for businesses seeking comprehensive design services.

pricing.name: Enterprise Package
pricing.description: Ideal for large businesses requiring extensive design solutions.

proposal2.ctaHeadline: Ready to Transform Acme Corp's Brand?
proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's discuss how our strategic design solutions can drive your business forward.

lead.company_description: From branding to custom websites and everything in between, Shida Studio is your one-stop shop for all your graphic design needs. Our team of professionals will keep you informed and involved throughout the entire process. Consider us an extension of your own 'in-house' design department.
